question: 1. Which of the following points is/are true about Linked List data structure when it is compared with array?

answers.a: Arrays have better cache locality that can make them better in terms of performance.
answers.b: It is easy to insert and delete elements in Linked List
answers.c: Random access is not allowed in a typical implementation of Linked Lists
